meanings.sent1: The choroidal layer helps supply blood to the eye.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined the choroidal vessels during the eye check-up.
meanings.sent3: The choroidal pigmentation made the eye look like a colorful rainbow.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination painted a choroidal sky filled with stars and galaxies.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the choroidal tissue stood out against the white background.

meanings.definition: of or relating to the choroid coat of the eye
meanings.sent1: The choroidal blood vessels play a crucial role in eye health.
meanings.sent2: The choroidal layer protects the delicate structures within the eye.
meanings.sent3: The artist painted a mural depicting the intricate details of the choroidal coat.
meanings.sent4: Her love for nature was reflected in the intricate patterns of the choroidal coat.
meanings.sent5: The choroidal coat acts as a shield, safeguarding the eye from harm.
